title: spectest checksums no longer match
body:
### Description

Checksums for spectest fixtures currently configured in our bazel workspace no longer match the release gzips.

We are currently using `v1.2.0-rc.1` here:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

Yes, this worked until the gzips were updated upstream.

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

On develop, run:
```
$ bazel build //...
```

## üî• Error
```
INFO: Repository consensus_spec_tests_general instantiated at:
  /home/kasey/src/prysmaticlabs/prysm/WORKSPACE:222:13: in <toplevel>
Repository rule http_archive defined at:
  /home/kasey/.cache/bazel/_bazel_kasey/e28cd52451c4ead1ba09bfd91293b70f/external/bazel_tools/tools/build_defs/repo/http.bzl:364:31: in <toplevel>
WARNING: Download from https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.2.0-rc.1/general.tar.gz failed: class com.google.devtools.build.lib.bazel.repository.downloader.UnrecoverableHttpException Checksum was 9c93f87378aaa6d6fe1c67b396eac2aacc9594af2a83f028cb99c95dea5b81df but wanted 57120e8e2d5aaec956fc6a25ddc58fae2477f5b3ac7789174cf5ac1106dcc151

                download_info = ctx.download_and_extract(
Error in download_and_extract: java.io.IOException: Error downloading [https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.2.0-rc.1/general.tar.gz] to /home/kasey/.cache/bazel/_bazel_kasey/e28cd52451c4ead1ba09bfd91293b70f/external/consensus_spec_tests_general/temp15243577401507899120/general.tar.gz: Checksum was 9c93f87378aaa6d6fe1c67b396eac2aacc9594af2a83f028cb99c95dea5b81df but wanted 57120e8e2d5aaec956fc6a25ddc58fae2477f5b3ac7789174cf5ac1106dcc151
ERROR: /home/kasey/src/prysmaticlabs/prysm/WORKSPACE:222:13: fetching http_archive rule //external:consensus_spec_tests_general: Traceback (most recent call last):

                download_info = ctx.download_and_extract(
Error in download_and_extract: java.io.IOException: Error downloading [https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/download/v1.2.0-rc.1/general.tar.gz] to /home/kasey/.cache/bazel/_bazel_kasey/e28cd52451c4ead1ba09bfd91293b70f/external/consensus_spec_tests_general/temp15243577401507899120/general.tar.gz: Checksum was 9c93f87378aaa6d6fe1c67b396eac2aacc9594af2a83f028cb99c95dea5b81df but wanted 57120e8e2d5aaec956fc6a25ddc58fae2477f5b3ac7789174cf5ac1106dcc151
